name: QLPreviewControllerDataSource
desc: The data source for a preview controller must adopt this protocol to provide preview items to the controller.

items.name: func numberOfPreviewItems(in: QLPreviewController) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of preview items to include in the preview navigation list.

items.name: func previewController(QLPreviewController, previewItemAt: Int) -> QLPreviewItem
items.desc: Returns the preview item that the controller should display for the specified index.
